hero.title: Enjoy Baseball with Kids in Tokyo!
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Sakura Baseball Club where we foster children's growth and friendship

about.title: About Us
about.description: Sakura Baseball Club is a youth baseball team based in Koto Ward, Tokyo. Established in 2010, we focus not only on improving baseball skills but also on developing children's physical and mental growth, teamwork, and sense of responsibility. Currently, we have about 40 players from grades 1 to 6.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the coaches and key players of Sakura Baseball Club. We work together as one team to improve skills and develop character.

join.title: Join Us
join.description: Sakura Baseball Club is always looking for new members. Children with no baseball experience are also welcome!
join.requirements: Eligibility: Elementary school grades 1-6 (boys and girls) | Practice: Every Saturday & Sunday 9:00-12:00 | Location: Koto Ward Park Ground

form.title: Membership Application Form

form.messagePlaceholder: Please enter any questions or requests you may have
form.success: Your application has been received. We will send you a confirmation email shortly.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or inquiries, please feel free to contact us using the form below.
